enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting or checking the presence of a value, which can be used to ensure proper state setup before invoking setValue.
Both methods involve setting a value and notifying consumers, which can be used to ensure proper state setup before invoking setValue.
The map method may need to be invoked after setValue to transform the value, ensuring the value is set before any transformations occur.
The flatMap method may need to be invoked after setValue to transform the value into another DeferredChanged, ensuring the value is set before any transformations occur.
